channel.title: Community updates on OKNIA.org
channel.description: Recent content in Community updates on OKNIA.org

item.title: Native Species Seedlings for Open Space
item.description: Hi All, We want to thank all of the volunteers who have helped OKNIA’s ongoing efforts of meadow restoration within King Estate Open Space. In addition to invasive species removal, this year’s winter season we would like to plant native species into selected areas within the Open Space. For this we need volunteers to help raise seedlings for transplant after the rains have started. Last summer we gathered wildflower seeds, section by section a few days before the goats chomped them.
